frame.name: Precision Frame
frame.description:
Fires a slower grenade projectile that bounces. 
[Shoot]  : Fire; release to detonate.

perks.description:
This weapon's barrel provides faster projectiles and much faster aiming.
  •  Greatly increases handling speed
  •  Increases projectile speed
perks.name: Quick Launch

perks.description:
Reduces weight for faster reloads.
  •  Greatly increases reload speed
  •  Decreases stability
perks.name: Alloy Casing

perks.description: Increased accuracy, stability, and handling when firing while crouched.
perks.name: Firmly Planted
